name: Protect The Crown (RealPersonMaybe)
description:
A simple game where you must defend your crown, as you are King, against groups of increasingly intense enemies, using only your sword, unexplained magical powers, and a prompt trigger finger.

To swing your sword takes only one button press, yet it may be any button you are capable of pressing; be warned, the momentum of every swing will flip your direction. Be careful not to miss a hit,  you may not be able to turn around in time to survive!

With each one of your lethal swings, the enemies spray (and some times explode into) a bloody mist of conspicuous red particles. Be careful of any enemies that may be clouded within it!

Compete amongst yourself and other in an attempt to claim the Crown (the highest possible score).

Controls:

Sword Swing - Any Key or Mouse Button (except Escape)

Quit Game - Escape

Any feedback, especially regarding the difficulty, atmosphere, and the (minor amount of) sound design present within game, would be greatly appreciated!

Credits:

Music - "Dead Cells - Elite Fight" by Yoann Laulan

Animated Sprites - Luiz Melo: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/34852

Castle Tile Sheet and Background - Szadi Art.: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/40094

Programming and all other graphics were done by myself.

- Tyler Lynch
